name: Grasp HR
slogan: Engage, upskill & retain your top talent, through mentoring
description:
Our B2B SaaS product enables employees of our clients to create a profile, list their strengths, their development goals and personal interests. They can then browse the rest of the company and connect with anyone for customised and flexible mentorship.

We have an ambitious pipeline of product upgrades coming in 2020!

team.name: Joanne Sperryn
team.bioHtml: Creative business builder, looking for A-players to take Grasp to the next level.

jobs.title: Head of Engagement
jobs.description:
As Head of Engagement, your main objective will be to drive employee adoption of our mentoring software within our growing list of enterprise clients.

You'll work closely with the Heads of business development, marketing, support, operations and product, acting as the voice of our existing users. Are you curious, love working with business users, able to think of strategies to test to increase adoption and grow usage?
 
You'll design and execute pre-launch, launch and retention initiatives for a number of customer profiles, to raise awareness and increase adoption through the launch phases, across a growing number of enterprise clients.
 
Are you data-driven? technically savvy? Have experience in enterprise engagement?  Would you be happy to present and feel confident interviewing senior executives as part of a video content strategy? We need to engage our clients' workforce from the top, down... so spreading executive buy-in in key. 

Does this role sound right for you? If so, we'd love to hear from you!

Come and join us at our office based in Vauxhall and work directly with the Head of Ops to understand our customers’ goals in relation to their use of Grasp and grow the adoption of Grasp within each organisation through a number of engagement channels. (Events, Email Marketing, Digital Marketing, Video marketing eg. Interviews with internal influencers/mentoring champions).

Your responsibilities will include:
- Developing a white label engagement program to roll out to our corporate clients, customising it where necessary.
- Manage the production of generic and bespoke engagement content (emails, videos, articles, interviews).
- Report on campaign initiatives and adjust to optimise them.
- Collaborate with Heads of Ops, Product, Support and Marketing.
- Build and manage a team as we grow.
- Find and collaborate with L&D influencers to produce thought-leadership pieces.

Some reasons we’ll love you:
• You’re data-driven and love to test and optimise strategies.
• You’re interested in learning and development.
 • You have a track record of creating and managing an engagement program across a large organisation, preferably for an B2B SaaS provider.
 • You are detail-oriented, structured and organised.
• You present your creative ideas, expectations and information in a concise and well-organized way.
• You have strong communication skills.
• You think that creating documentation is the best way of making great ideas and processes permanent.
• You are quick to learn, practically minded and stop at nothing to get things done.
• You’re a team player and enjoy collaborating.
 • You can build and manage a team as we grow.

Is this you? We'd love to meet you!
